sys_script_include.description: The DataSilosGetStatus is called by the DataSilos extension point instance class and returns the plugin_status object with additional status information to be displayed on the Status page.
sys_script_include.name: DataSilosGetStatus

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1d814459db8f19106a03dad1f3961916
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_datasilosci.DataSilosGetStatus</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>The DataSilosGetStatus is called by the DataSilos extension point instance class and returns the plugin_status object with additional status information to be displayed on the Status page.</description><name>DataSilosGetStatus</name><script><![CDATA[function DataSilosGetStatus(status)
{
	var SetValue = x_snc_devtools.SetValue;
	var GetAllSupportedTables = x_snc_datasilos.GetAllSupportedTables;
	
	// Define a new column 'demo'
	SetValue('Demo',status,'columns','demo','header');
	
	var aTables = GetAllSupportedTables();
	for (var nTable = 0; nTable < aTables.length; nTable++)
	{
		// Add some meaningful status information or useful links for each table:
		SetValue('Add some meaningful information about table '+strTable,status,'tables',strTable,'demo');
	}
	
	return status;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-07 16:21:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>1d814459db8f19106a03dad1f3961916</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DataSilosGetStatus</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_datasilosci">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1d814459db8f19106a03dad1f3961916</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-07 16:21:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
